Literature.Title: In vitro studies on a natural lantibiotic, paenibacillin: A new-generation antibacterial drug candidate to overcome multidrug-resistance.
Literature.Author: Jangra M, Kaur M, Nandanwar H

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Rabbit erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=<60 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:IC50=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=1.56µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=0.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=0.39µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=0.39-1.56µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis MTCC 3615(MIC=0.39µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=0.2µM),Enterococcus faecium NCTC 7171(MIC=0.1µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 51559(MIC=0.1µM),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=0.1-0.2µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 51299(MIC=0.78µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=0.39µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 29665(MIC=>25µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=12.5µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>25µM)
